ArcK8sName.value: fill in Arc enabled kubernetes name

location.value: fill in location of Arc enabled kubernetes cluster

VaultName.value: fill in the name of key vault

appid.value: fill in the application id of service principal

objid.value: fill in the object id of service principal

acrName.value: fill in the name of Azure container registry where hold images

tokenName.value: fill in the name of ACR token
